Acts 15

What do we do with the Old Testament?

  • The Old Testament proclaims God's:

    • Character
    • Heart
    • Power

  • The Old Testament DOES NOT:

    • Let us pick and choose.

    • Give us a system to remove sin.

      Galations 3:1-4

      Hebrews 10:1-4

  • What do we do with the Laws and Commandments?

    If it is repeated in the New Testament: obey it

    If it is not repeated: be careful

    We are under a new covenant.
